subtitle: Order from any campus food shop, get a token, and pick up your meal when it's ready. No more waiting in crowded food courts.
whyChooseDesc: Built specifically for university food courts to eliminate wait times and improve your dining experience.
feature1Desc: Order ahead and get a pickup time. No more waiting in long food court lines.
feature2Desc: Browse menus from all campus shops in one place. Easy mobile ordering.
feature3Desc: See which shops are busy and get suggestions for faster service.
feature4Desc: Get a unique token number and estimated pickup time for every order.
howItWorksDesc: Simple, fast, and designed for busy students.
step1Desc: Choose from 30+ campus food shops. Add items to cart and place your order in seconds.
step2Desc: Receive a unique token number and estimated pickup time. Track your order status in real-time.
step3Desc: Skip the queue entirely. Just show your token at pickup time and enjoy your meal.
ctaDesc: Join thousands of students who've made their campus dining experience better.

footer.tagline: Skip the Queue, Savor the Food
footer.description: Revolutionizing campus dining with smart ordering, real-time tokens, and queue-free pickup. Making student life deliciously convenient.
footer.feedbackPrompt: Have feedback or suggestions? We'd love to hear from you!
footer.feedbackDescription: We value your opinion! Please share your thoughts, suggestions, or any issues you've encountered.

footer.thankYouFeedback: Thank you for your feedback! We'll get back to you soon.

howItWorksPage.title: How It Works
howItWorksPage.introduction: Welcome to TakeAway, your campus food delivery platform designed to make ordering food quick, easy, and convenient. This guide will walk you through how to use our platform to order delicious meals from your favorite campus restaurants and eateries.
howItWorksPage.section1Para1: To begin using TakeAway, you need to create an account. Click on the "Student Portal" link in the footer or navigate to the authentication page. Fill in your details including your name, email address, and create a secure password. Once registered, you can log in anytime to start ordering.
howItWorksPage.section1Para2: If you're a shopkeeper looking to list your restaurant on our platform, select the "Shopkeeper" role during registration. Shopkeepers have access to a dedicated dashboard where they can manage their menu, view orders, and track their business performance.
howItWorksPage.section2Para1: After logging in, you'll be taken to your dashboard where you can browse all available restaurants and food vendors on campus. Each shop card displays essential information including the shop name, cuisine type, rating, and estimated preparation time. You can use the search bar to find specific restaurants or filter by cuisine type.
howItWorksPage.section2Para2: Click on any shop card to view more details, including their full menu, operating hours, and current availability. This helps you make informed decisions about where to order from.
howItWorksPage.section3Para1: Once you've selected a restaurant, browse through their menu items. Each item shows its name, description, price, and estimated preparation time. Add items to your cart by clicking the "Add to Cart" button. You can adjust quantities and review your selections before proceeding to checkout.
howItWorksPage.section3Para2: When you're ready, click on your cart and proceed to checkout. Review your order summary, including item details, quantities, and total amount. You'll also see the estimated preparation time for your order. Confirm your order details and proceed to payment.
howItWorksPage.section4Para1: TakeAway supports secure payment processing. After confirming your order, you'll be prompted to complete the payment. Once your payment is approved, you'll receive a confirmation notification with your order details, including a unique order token number.
howItWorksPage.section4Para2: The order token is important - it helps you track your order status and serves as a reference when picking up your food. Keep this token number handy, as you'll need it to collect your order from the restaurant.
howItWorksPage.section5Para1: After placing your order, you can track its progress in real-time through the "Active Orders" section on your dashboard. The order status will update automatically as it moves through different stages:
howItWorksPage.section5Status1: Pending Approval: Your order is waiting for the shopkeeper to approve it.
howItWorksPage.section5Status2: Approved: The shopkeeper has accepted your order and payment.
howItWorksPage.section5Status3: Preparing: The restaurant is preparing your food.
howItWorksPage.section5Status4: Ready: Your order is ready for pickup.
howItWorksPage.section5Para2: You'll receive notifications at each stage, keeping you informed about when your food will be ready for pickup.
howItWorksPage.section6Para1: When your order status shows "Ready," you can head to the restaurant to pick it up. Make sure to bring your order token number with you. Present it to the shopkeeper when collecting your order. The token helps them quickly locate and verify your order.
howItWorksPage.section6Para2: Once you've collected your order, the shopkeeper will mark it as "Fulfilled" in the system. Your order history will be updated, and you can view all your past orders in the "My Orders" section.
howItWorksPage.section7Para1: All your orders are saved in your order history. You can access this by clicking on "My Orders" in the navigation menu. Here, you can view details of all your past and current orders, including order dates, items ordered, amounts paid, and order status.
howItWorksPage.section7Para2: You can filter your orders by status (In Progress, Delivered, Cancelled) and use the date range selector to view orders from specific time periods. Click on any order card to view a detailed summary, including item breakdown, pricing, and transaction information.
howItWorksPage.section8Para1: If you're a restaurant owner or shopkeeper, TakeAway provides you with a comprehensive dashboard to manage your business. After registering as a shopkeeper, you can:
howItWorksPage.section8Item1: Set up your shop profile with details, operating hours, and location
howItWorksPage.section8Item2: Add and manage your menu items with descriptions, prices, and preparation times
howItWorksPage.section8Item3: View incoming orders and approve or reject them
howItWorksPage.section8Item4: Track order status and update them as orders progress
howItWorksPage.section8Item5: Monitor your business analytics including revenue, order counts, and fulfillment times
howItWorksPage.section8Item6: Manage your active token count to control order flow
howItWorksPage.section8Para2: The shopkeeper dashboard gives you full control over your restaurant's presence on TakeAway, helping you efficiently manage orders and grow your business.
howItWorksPage.section9Para1: TakeAway uses an "Active Tokens" system to help manage order flow. Each shop displays the number of active tokens, which represents the number of orders currently being prepared or ready for pickup. This helps you understand how busy a restaurant is before placing an order.
howItWorksPage.section9Para2: Active tokens increment when a payment is approved and decrement when an order is fulfilled or collected. This system ensures transparency and helps both customers and shopkeepers manage order volumes effectively.
howItWorksPage.section10Para1: We value your feedback and are here to help! If you have any questions, concerns, or suggestions, you can reach out to us through the "Support Center" or "Send us a feedback" options in the footer. Our support team is committed to providing you with the best possible experience.
howItWorksPage.section10Para2: You can also contact us directly via phone at +91 7875538084 or email at akshadvengurlekar35@gmail.com. We're always happy to assist you with any issues or inquiries.
howItWorksPage.closing: Thank you for choosing TakeAway! We hope this guide helps you make the most of our platform. Happy ordering!

privacyPolicy.title: Privacy Policy
privacyPolicy.introPara1: Welcome to TakeAway ("we," "our," or "us"). We are committed to protecting your privacy and ensuring the security of your personal information. This Privacy Policy explains how we collect, use, disclose, and safeguard your information when you use our food ordering platform.
privacyPolicy.introPara2: By using our service, you agree to the collection and use of information in accordance with this policy. Please read this Privacy Policy carefully to understand our practices regarding your data.
privacyPolicy.personalInfoDesc: We collect information that you provide directly to us, including:
privacyPolicy.personalInfoList1: Name and contact information (email address, phone number)
privacyPolicy.personalInfoList3: Payment information (processed securely through third-party payment processors)
privacyPolicy.usageInfoDesc: We automatically collect certain information when you use our service:
privacyPolicy.usageInfoList1: Device information (device type, operating system, browser type)
privacyPolicy.usageInfoList3: Usage patterns, pages visited, and time spent on our platform
privacyPolicy.usageInfoList4: Cookies and similar tracking technologies (see our Cookie Policy)
privacyPolicy.shopkeeperInfoDesc: If you are a shopkeeper using our platform, we also collect:
privacyPolicy.shopkeeperInfoList1: Business information (shop name, address, contact details)
privacyPolicy.howWeUseDesc: We use the collected information for various purposes:
privacyPolicy.howWeUseList1: Service Delivery: To process and fulfill your orders, manage your account, and provide customer support
privacyPolicy.howWeUseList2: Communication: To send order confirmations, updates, and important service-related notifications
privacyPolicy.howWeUseList3: Improvement: To analyze usage patterns and improve our platform, services, and user experience
privacyPolicy.howWeUseList4: Personalization: To customize content and provide personalized recommendations
privacyPolicy.howWeUseList5: Security: To detect, prevent, and address technical issues, fraud, and security threats
privacyPolicy.howWeUseList6: Legal Compliance: To comply with applicable laws, regulations, and legal processes
privacyPolicy.howWeUseList7: Marketing: To send promotional materials (with your consent) and communicate about new features
privacyPolicy.sharingDesc: We do not sell your personal information. We may share your information only in the following circumstances:
privacyPolicy.sharingList1: Service Providers: With third-party vendors who perform services on our behalf (payment processing, delivery services, analytics)
privacyPolicy.sharingList2: Business Partners: With restaurants and shops to fulfill your orders
privacyPolicy.sharingList3: Legal Requirements: When required by law, court order, or government regulation
privacyPolicy.sharingList4: Business Transfers: In connection with a merger, acquisition, or sale of assets
privacyPolicy.sharingList5: Consent: When you have given explicit consent to share your information
privacyPolicy.sharingList6: Protection: To protect our rights, property, or safety, or that of our users
privacyPolicy.dataSecurityDesc1: We implement appropriate technical and organizational measures to protect your personal information against unauthorized access, alteration, disclosure, or destruction. However, no method of transmission over the internet or electronic storage is 100% secure, and we cannot guarantee absolute security.
privacyPolicy.dataSecurityDesc2: We use encryption, secure servers, and regular security assessments to safeguard your data. All payment information is processed through secure, PCI-compliant third-party payment processors.
privacyPolicy.rightsDesc: Depending on your location, you may have certain rights regarding your personal information:
privacyPolicy.rightsList1: Access: Request access to your personal information
privacyPolicy.rightsList2: Correction: Request correction of inaccurate or incomplete information
privacyPolicy.rightsList3: Deletion: Request deletion of your personal information
privacyPolicy.rightsList4: Portability: Request transfer of your data to another service
privacyPolicy.rightsList6: Cookies: Manage cookie preferences through your browser settings
privacyPolicy.rightsContact: To exercise these rights, please contact us using the information provided in the "Contact Us" section below.
privacyPolicy.retentionDesc: We retain your personal information for as long as necessary to fulfill the purposes outlined in this Privacy Policy, unless a longer retention period is required or permitted by law. When we no longer need your information, we will securely delete or anonymize it.
privacyPolicy.childrensDesc: Our service is not intended for individuals under the age of 18. We do not knowingly collect personal information from children. If we become aware that we have collected information from a child without parental consent, we will take steps to delete such information.
privacyPolicy.changesDesc: We may update this Privacy Policy from time to time to reflect changes in our practices or for other operational, legal, or regulatory reasons. We will notify you of any material changes by posting the new Privacy Policy on this page and updating the "Last updated" date. We encourage you to review this Privacy Policy periodically.
privacyPolicy.contactDesc: If you have any questions, concerns, or requests regarding this Privacy Policy or our data practices, please contact us:
privacyPolicy.addressValue: TakeAway Privacy Team, Campus Eats Platform

termsOfService.title: Terms of Service
termsOfService.agreementDesc: By accessing or using TakeAway ("the Service"), you agree to be bound by these Terms of Service ("Terms"). If you disagree with any part of these terms, you may not access the Service. These Terms apply to all users of the Service, including customers, shopkeepers, and other visitors.
termsOfService.eligibilityDesc: You must be at least 18 years old to use our Service. By using the Service, you represent and warrant that you are of legal age and have the capacity to enter into these Terms.
termsOfService.registrationDesc: To use certain features of the Service, you must create an account. You agree to:
termsOfService.registrationList1: Provide accurate, current, and complete information during registration
termsOfService.registrationList2: Maintain and update your account information to keep it accurate
termsOfService.registrationList3: Maintain the security of your account credentials
termsOfService.registrationList4: Accept responsibility for all activities that occur under your account
termsOfService.registrationList5: Notify us immediately of any unauthorized use of your account
termsOfService.acceptableUseList1: Use the Service for any unlawful purpose or in violation of any laws
termsOfService.acceptableUseList2: Impersonate any person or entity or misrepresent your affiliation
termsOfService.acceptableUseList3: Interfere with or disrupt the Service or servers connected to the Service
termsOfService.acceptableUseList4: Attempt to gain unauthorized access to any part of the Service
termsOfService.acceptableUseList5: Use automated systems (bots, scrapers) to access the Service without permission
termsOfService.acceptableUseList6: Post false, misleading, or defamatory content
termsOfService.acceptableUseList7: Harass, abuse, or harm other users
termsOfService.orderPlacementDesc: When you place an order through our Service, you are making an offer to purchase food items from the selected shop. Orders are subject to acceptance by the shopkeeper. We reserve the right to refuse or cancel any order at our discretion.
termsOfService.pricingDesc1: All prices are displayed in the currency specified on the platform and are subject to change without notice.
termsOfService.pricingDesc2: Payment must be completed through our secure payment gateway. We accept various payment methods as specified on the platform.
termsOfService.pricingDesc3: All payments are processed securely through third-party payment processors. We do not store your complete payment card information.
termsOfService.cancellationDesc1: Orders may be cancelled before preparation begins, subject to the shopkeeper's approval. Refund policies vary by shop and are subject to their terms.
termsOfService.cancellationDesc2: If you are unsatisfied with your order, please contact the shop directly or use our customer support channels.
termsOfService.shopkeeperDesc: If you are a shopkeeper using our platform, you agree to:
termsOfService.shopkeeperList1: Provide accurate information about your shop, menu items, and pricing
termsOfService.shopkeeperList2: Maintain food safety standards and comply with all applicable health regulations
termsOfService.shopkeeperList3: Process orders in a timely manner and communicate any delays to customers
termsOfService.shopkeeperList5: Handle customer complaints and issues professionally
termsOfService.shopkeeperList6: Comply with all applicable laws and regulations
termsOfService.ipDesc1: The Service and its original content, features, and functionality are owned by TakeAway and are protected by international copyright, trademark, patent, trade secret, and other intellectual property laws.
termsOfService.ipDesc2: You may not copy, modify, distribute, sell, or lease any part of our Service without our prior written consent.
termsOfService.availabilityDesc: We strive to provide a reliable Service, but we do not guarantee that the Service will be available at all times or free from errors, interruptions, or defects.
termsOfService.foodQualityDesc: We act as a platform connecting customers with shops. We are not responsible for the quality, safety, or accuracy of food items prepared by shops. Each shop is responsible for compliance with food safety regulations.
termsOfService.liabilityDesc: To the maximum extent permitted by law, TakeAway shall not be liable for any indirect, incidental, special, consequential, or punitive damages, or any loss of profits or revenues, whether incurred directly or indirectly, or any loss of data, use, goodwill, or other intangible losses resulting from your use of the Service.
termsOfService.indemnificationDesc: You agree to defend, indemnify, and hold harmless TakeAway and its officers, directors, employees, and agents from and against any claims, liabilities, damages, losses, and expenses, including reasonable legal fees, arising out of or in any way connected with your use of the Service, violation of these Terms, or violation of any rights of another.
termsOfService.terminationDesc1: We may terminate or suspend your account and access to the Service immediately, without prior notice or liability, for any reason, including if you breach these Terms.
termsOfService.terminationDesc2: Upon termination, your right to use the Service will cease immediately. All provisions of these Terms that by their nature should survive termination shall survive, including ownership provisions, warranty disclaimers, indemnity, and limitations of liability.
termsOfService.changesDesc: We reserve the right to modify or replace these Terms at any time. If a revision is material, we will provide at least 30 days' notice prior to any new terms taking effect. What constitutes a material change will be determined at our sole discretion. Continued use of the Service after any such changes constitutes your acceptance of the new Terms.
termsOfService.governingLawDesc: These Terms shall be governed by and construed in accordance with the laws of India, without regard to its conflict of law provisions. Any disputes arising from these Terms or the Service shall be subject to the exclusive jurisdiction of the courts in India.
termsOfService.contactDesc: If you have any questions about these Terms of Service, please contact us:
termsOfService.addressValue: TakeAway Legal Team, Campus Eats Platform

cookiePolicy.title: Cookie Policy
cookiePolicy.cookiesDesc1: Cookies are small text files that are placed on your device (computer, smartphone, or tablet) when you visit a website. They are widely used to make websites work more efficiently and provide information to the website owners.
cookiePolicy.cookiesDesc2: TakeAway uses cookies and similar tracking technologies to enhance your experience, analyze site usage, and assist in marketing efforts. This Cookie Policy explains how we use cookies and your choices regarding them.
cookiePolicy.essentialDesc: These cookies are necessary for the website to function properly. They enable core functionality such as security, network management, and accessibility.
cookiePolicy.essentialPurpose: Authentication, security, and maintaining your session
cookiePolicy.essentialDuration: Session cookies (deleted when you close your browser) or persistent cookies (remain until expiration)
cookiePolicy.essentialDisable: No - these are required for the Service to work
cookiePolicy.performanceDesc: These cookies help us understand how visitors interact with our website by collecting and reporting information anonymously.
cookiePolicy.performancePurpose: Analyze website traffic, user behavior, and improve our services
cookiePolicy.performanceDisable: Yes - you can opt-out through your browser settings or our cookie preferences
cookiePolicy.functionalityDesc: These cookies allow the website to remember choices you make and provide enhanced, personalized features.
cookiePolicy.functionalityPurpose: Remember your preferences, language settings, and login information
cookiePolicy.functionalityExamples: Shopping cart contents, preferred delivery address, order history
cookiePolicy.functionalityDisable: Yes, but some features may not work properly
cookiePolicy.marketingDesc: These cookies are used to deliver advertisements that are relevant to you and your interests. They also help measure the effectiveness of advertising campaigns.
cookiePolicy.marketingPurpose: Track your browsing habits, show personalized ads, and measure ad performance
cookiePolicy.marketingExamples: Social media pixels, advertising network cookies
cookiePolicy.marketingDisable: Yes - you can opt-out through your browser settings or ad preferences
cookiePolicy.thirdPartyDesc1: In addition to our own cookies, we may also use various third-party cookies to report usage statistics, deliver advertisements, and provide other services. These third parties may include:
cookiePolicy.thirdPartyList1: Analytics Providers: Google Analytics and similar services to understand how users interact with our platform
cookiePolicy.thirdPartyList2: Payment Processors: Razorpay and other payment gateways to securely process transactions
cookiePolicy.thirdPartyList3: Advertising Networks: To deliver relevant advertisements (if applicable)
cookiePolicy.thirdPartyList4: Social Media Platforms: For social sharing and authentication features
cookiePolicy.thirdPartyDesc2: These third parties may use cookies and similar technologies to collect information about your online activities across different websites. We do not control these third-party cookies, and we encourage you to review their privacy and cookie policies.
cookiePolicy.browserDesc1: Most web browsers allow you to control cookies through their settings. You can set your browser to refuse cookies or alert you when cookies are being sent. However, if you disable cookies, some parts of our Service may not function properly.
cookiePolicy.browserDesc2: Here are links to cookie management instructions for popular browsers:
cookiePolicy.cookiePrefDesc: You can manage your cookie preferences through your account settings on our platform. We provide options to enable or disable certain types of cookies, except for essential cookies which are required for the Service to function.
cookiePolicy.optOutDesc: You can opt-out of certain third-party cookies:
cookiePolicy.dntDesc: Some browsers include a "Do Not Track" (DNT) feature that signals to websites you visit that you do not want to have your online activity tracked. Currently, there is no standard for how DNT signals should be interpreted. As such, we do not currently respond to DNT browser signals or mechanisms.
cookiePolicy.retentionList1: Session Cookies: Temporary cookies that are deleted when you close your browser
cookiePolicy.retentionList2: Persistent Cookies: Remain on your device for a set period or until you delete them manually
cookiePolicy.retentionDesc2: The retention period for persistent cookies varies depending on their purpose. Essential cookies may be stored for longer periods to maintain your login session, while analytics cookies typically have shorter retention periods.
cookiePolicy.updatesDesc: We may update this Cookie Policy from time to time to reflect changes in our practices or for other operational, legal, or regulatory reasons. We will notify you of any material changes by posting the new Cookie Policy on this page and updating the "Last updated" date. We encourage you to review this Cookie Policy periodically.
cookiePolicy.contactDesc: If you have any questions about our use of cookies or this Cookie Policy, please contact us:
cookiePolicy.addressValue: TakeAway Cookie Policy Team, Campus Eats Platform

accessibility.title: Accessibility Statement
accessibility.commitmentDesc1: TakeAway is committed to ensuring digital accessibility for people with disabilities. We are continually improving the user experience for everyone and applying the relevant accessibility standards to achieve these goals.
accessibility.commitmentDesc2: We aim to conform to the Web Content Accessibility Guidelines (WCAG) 2.1 level AA standards, which explain how to make web content more accessible for people with disabilities and user-friendly for everyone.
accessibility.visualList2: Resizable text (up to 200% without loss of functionality)
accessibility.interactiveList3: Error messages that are easy to understand
accessibility.screenReaderList2: ARIA labels and roles where appropriate
accessibility.browserDesc: Our platform is designed to work with the following assistive technologies and browsers:
accessibility.browserList1: Screen Readers: NVDA, JAWS, VoiceOver, TalkBack
accessibility.browserList2: Browsers: Latest versions of Chrome, Firefox, Safari, and Edge
accessibility.browserList3: Keyboard Navigation: Full support across all browsers
accessibility.browserList4: Screen Magnification: Compatible with browser zoom and screen magnifiers
accessibility.limitationsDesc1: While we strive to make TakeAway fully accessible, we are aware of some areas that may need improvement. We are actively working to address these issues:
accessibility.limitationsList1: Some third-party content (such as maps) may not be fully accessible
accessibility.limitationsList2: Video content may not always have captions (we are working to add this feature)
accessibility.limitationsList3: Some complex interactive elements may require additional keyboard navigation improvements
accessibility.limitationsDesc2: We are committed to making continuous improvements to accessibility. If you encounter any accessibility barriers, please contact us using the information provided below.
accessibility.adjustmentsDesc: You can customize your experience on our platform:
accessibility.adjustmentsList1: Text Size: Use your browser's zoom feature (Ctrl/Cmd + Plus/Minus) to adjust text size
accessibility.adjustmentsList2: Colors: Use browser extensions or operating system settings to adjust color contrast
accessibility.adjustmentsList3: Keyboard: Navigate the entire site using only your keyboard
accessibility.adjustmentsList4: Screen Reader: Our site is compatible with popular screen reader software
accessibility.feedbackDesc: We welcome your feedback on the accessibility of TakeAway. If you encounter any accessibility barriers or have suggestions for improvement, please contact us:
accessibility.contactList2: The page URL where you encountered the issue
accessibility.contactList3: Your browser and assistive technology information (if applicable)
accessibility.thirdPartyDesc1: Some content on our platform is provided by third parties, including:
accessibility.thirdPartyDesc2: While we strive to work with accessible third-party services, we cannot guarantee the accessibility of all third-party content. If you encounter accessibility issues with third-party content, please let us know, and we will work to find accessible alternatives.
accessibility.complianceDesc: We are committed to compliance with:
accessibility.complianceList1: WCAG 2.1 Level AA: Web Content Accessibility Guidelines
accessibility.complianceList3: ADA: Americans with Disabilities Act (where applicable)
accessibility.updatesDesc: We will review and update this Accessibility Statement regularly to reflect our ongoing commitment to accessibility. Any updates will be posted on this page with a revised "Last updated" date. We encourage you to check this page periodically for the latest information on our accessibility efforts.
accessibility.alternativeDesc1: If you continue to experience accessibility issues with our digital platform, we are happy to provide alternative methods to access our services:
accessibility.alternativeList3: In-person support at participating locations (where available)
accessibility.alternativeDesc2: Please contact our accessibility team to discuss alternative access methods that work best for you.
accessibility.addressValue: TakeAway Accessibility Team, Campus Eats Platform
